mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_requirements ( user_id, team_size, position_requirements, ability_requirements, teamwork_ability_requirements, need_team_formation, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{teamSize}, #{positionRequirements}, #{abilityRequirements}, #{teamworkAbilityRequirements}, #{needTeamFormation}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, team_size, position_requirements, ability_requirements, teamwork_ability_requirements, need_team_formation, create_time, update_time FROM team_requirements WHERE id = #{id}
